==== Notes ====

* Problem with touchpad after suspend
<pre>
sudo vi /etc/default/grub
</pre>
modify line
<pre>
GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet splash"
</pre>
to
<pre>
GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="quiet splash i8042.nomux=1 i8042.noloop=1"
</pre>
